meanings.definition: To write or draw hastily or carelessly
meanings.sent1: She scrawled a note on the paper quickly.
meanings.sent2: He always scrawls his signature on documents.
meanings.sent3: The cat scrawled its name in the sand with its tail.
meanings.sent4: The wind scrawled patterns in the snow.
meanings.sent5: The child scrawled a picture of the sun with crayons.

meanings.definition: A hastily or carelessly written or drawn mark or inscription
meanings.sent1: The scraw on the wall was barely legible.
meanings.sent2: She found a mysterious scraw on the old map.
meanings.sent3: The scraw on the tree looked like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: The scraw on the sidewalk seemed to lead nowhere.
meanings.sent5: The scraw on the whiteboard caught everyone's attention.
